00006 dds::Subscriber::Subscriber() 
00007   : dp_(dds::peer::RuntimeImpl::instance().get_participant())
00008 {
00009   ::dds::SubscriberQos pubQos;
00010   pubQos.set_partition(::dds::peer::RuntimeImpl::DEFAULT_PARTITION);
00011 
00012   DDS::Subscriber* p = dp_->create_subscriber(pubQos, 0, DDS::ANY_STATUS);
00013 
00014   Assert::postcondition((p != 0), "Unable to create Subscriber", __FILE__);
00015 
00016   this->reset(p, dds::mem::SubDeleter(dp_));
00017 
00018 }
00019
